BusquedaDeLineas.ContenidoAlertCalles: Select a street on the map in which the search will be done

Ubicacion.ContenidoAlertUbicacion: Press the place where you'd like to go on the map.

Origen.ContenidoAlertOrigen: Press your starting point on the map.
Origen.ContenidoAlertDestino: Press the place where you'd like to go on the map ..

IrDesdeMiUbicacion.ToastLineasCercanas: This are the closer public transportation cars that go near the place you selected.
IrDesdeMiUbicacion.ToastNinguno: There are no public transportation cars that go to the points you selected, or they're out of the coverage which the system has.
IrDesdeMiUbicacion.ToastCobertura: This is the coverage of the application,there are no public transportation cars registered that go outside from the coverage area.
IrDesdeMiUbicacion.ContenidoAlertErrorBusqueda: Ups, something went wrong, Verify the points you've made are correct and try again
IrDesdeMiUbicacion.ContenidoAlertGps: The GPS is not active, please verify and try again
IrDesdeMiUbicacion.ContenidoAlertDistancia: The distance between the two points must be greater than 300 meters.

InformacionPuntoEstrategico.VerPuntoMapa: Notice the point in the map:
InformacionPuntoEstrategico.Lineas: Public transportation near the strategic point:

MisPuntos.ContenidoAlertPunto: Press on the map a point and add a name
MisPuntos.ContenidoAlertEliminar: ¿Are you sure about deleting this point from your list?

Configuracion.ContenidoIdioma: Select the language of your preference

MensajeIdioma.Titulo: Select the language of your preference

Configuracion.ContenidoActualizaciones: Automatic download when change and/or new routes from the public transportation
Configuracion.ContenidoTrafico: Recieve traffic news, street obstruction, etc.
Configuracion.ContenidoUnivalle: Changes the appearance of the application

Ayuda.ContenidoGuia1: Write the public transport name you'd like to find. There are norms that allow to filter the search about streets and specific types of public transportation.
Ayuda.ContenidoGuia2: Choose a starting point (It could be your current location or another selected in the map).
Ayuda.ContenidoGuia3: Choose a destiny, and the application will show you the closer public transportation cars that can take you to your destiny.
Ayuda.ContenidoGuia4: The coverage shows the actual reach of the application.
Ayuda.ContenidoGuia5: Shows the information and location from the strategic points of the city (Supply center, Turism, Health, etc). You can  make searchs with parameters.
Ayuda.ContenidoGuia6: Picked a strategic point it is posible to determine the public transportation cars that go near the point, and draw the route from your current location. The application also allows you to create your own strategic points.
Ayuda.ContenidoGuia7: Shows the relevant news for the city such as traffic information (Road cuts, RoadBlock, etc.). It can be switched off in the configuration panel

Botones.BotonVerTodosLosPuntos: Notice the points in the map:

Actualizacion.ContenidoMensaje: There is a new data update refering to the available pubic transportation disponible. It is advisable to make the update.
Actualizacion.ToastCargandoDatos: Wait a moment please... the application is updating the data
Actualizacion.MensajeAlertError: It wasn't possible to complete the download, this can be due to a connection problem. Please try again later.

ContenidoMensajeSalir: ¿Are you sure you'd like to exit Kaypi?
